channel.title: 145th Annual General Conference

item.title: “Why Call Ye Me Lord, Lord, and Do Not the Things Which I Say?”
item.description:
“Why Call Ye Me Lord, Lord, and Do Not the Things Which I Say?” by President Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 145th Annual General Conference on Mon Mar 31 1975
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church
